H0.text: who led an attack that allowed for american victory at yorktown. Marquis de Lafayette

H3.text: who led an attack that allowed for american victory at yorktown. George Washington

A4.text: The final American offensive began with a shot fired by Washington.

A5.text: Rochambeau never challenged Washington's authority as the battle's commanding officer.
